title: Consolidated - Play More Music (1992)
description:
Consolidated - Play More Music (1992)
192 kbps

The third full-length album by industrial/hip-hop group Consolidated.

During performances, Consolidated liked to place microphones in the crowd, so that the audience could interact with the band between songs. The short tracks on this album are comments by audience members at such performances, or interaction between the band and the audience.

This is the 27-track CD release, containing 4 which weren't on the vinyl LP release (tracks 07, 13, 18, 19).

This album was very hard to find online: I had to download it track by track from a streaming site which allowed only 1 download per day.  I'm sharing it here in the hope that more people can enjoy this great music.
